item.description: Millenium Park in West Roxbury is a beautiful place to have our first meetup. It's high above the surrounding towns and has a beautiful view of Boston and beyond. There are miles of trails that wind around the Charles River where you can enjoy the wildlife and the natural landscape. Let's meet in the parking lot at 10:45 am and start the fun. The park is located off the VFW Parkway behind the Home Depot.

group.name: The Chestnut Hill Walking Meetup Group

item.name: The Chestnut Hill Walking March Meetup
